error.beforeDateBeLaterAfter: The 'before' date must be later than the 'after' date.
error.afterDatebeEarlierBefore: The 'after' date must be earlier than the 'before' date.
error.minScoreMustBeLessOrEqualMaxScore: The 'min_score' must be less than or equal to the 'max_score'.
error.maxScoreMustBeGreaterOrEqualMinScore: The 'max_score' must be greater than or equal to the 'min_score'.
error.minSpeedMustBeLessOrEqualMaxSpeed: The 'min_speed' must be less than or equal to the 'max_speed'.
error.maxSpeedMustBeGreaterOrEqualMinSpeed: The 'max_speed' must be greater than or equal to the 'min_speed'.

tips.title: How to use text filters
tips.desc: Filters help you narrow down your search results. Here's how to use them in the input field:
tips.desc.step:
• Type a filter name followed by a colon (e.g., "cameras:").
  • Select a value from the suggestions or type your own.
  • Use multiple filters by adding them one after another with a space in between.
  • Date filters (before: and after:) use {{DateFormat}} format.
  • Time range filter uses {{exampleTime}} format.
  • Remove filters by clicking the 'x' next to them.
